spec.name: August 20th Hospital
spec.description:
🔻 Dates: 1930
🔻 Current Status: Hospital
🔻 National Material Patrimony Declaration: 2004
🔻 Description: Originally a French military hospital with the name Jean VIAL, the hospital was renamed to "20th August 1953 Hospital" after the independence in 1956. Today it is part of CHU IBN Rochd

https://mjcc.gov.ma/fr/departements/culture/patrimoine-materiel-national/
